title: Because He's Watching
description: Married mother of two Emily is flattered by her younger co-worker Ray's attention, but she never gives it a second thought until he makes a pass at her and she likes the kiss. When Emily confesses her transgression to her husband Ian, he doesn't give the reaction she expects. Not only does Ian not mind, her encourages Emily to see Ray again outside of work and respond to his advances. Emily is shocked, but can't fight her excitement at the idea. The married couple goes down a dangerous road and Emily fears where it may end.
author: Kirsten McCurran
